translations: adj.致命的；导致失败的，灾难性的

phrs.translation: 致命错误，不可恢复的错误
致命的吸引力（电影名称）；致命的诱惑（电影名称）

sentences.sentence: There was a fatal flaw in the plan.
sentences.translation: 计划中有一个致命的缺陷。

sentences.sentence: Two of the knife thrusts were fatal.
sentences.translation: 猛刺的其中两刀是致命的。

sentences.sentence: Even moderate amounts of the drug can be fatal.
sentences.translation: 这种药的用量即使不很大也会致命。
